alert.note: Alert for Douglas; Jefferson (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 01 at 2:58PM MDT until August 01 at 3:30PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central Douglas County in northeastern Colorado... Southwestern Jefferson County in central Colorado... * Until 330 PM MDT. * At 258 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Pine Grove, or 29 miles southwest of Denver, moving southeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Buffalo Creek around 310 PM MDT. Wellington Lake around 315 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include South Platte and Sprucewood. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
